name: Electrolysis
description:
A great hairy worm has wiggled for the last time and now it is time to redistribute its organic matter among the diatom folk. However others also want to partake in the feast. Defend the bounty with your electrical powers until your colony reaches you.

Use WASD (or arrow) keys to move, Left Mouse Button to shoot (harmless) tags, and Spacebar to electrocute everything connected by tags.

You get points for enemy kills, with bonus points for combos, but of course your ultimate goal is to keep (at least part of) the worm to yourself!

Good luck!
